name: One Man Is Not No Man
description: Do you want to fight with a sword? Do you want to feel like a hero? "One Man Is Not No Man" project will quench that desire! You will defend the castle from the army of enemies on your own!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: ...against impossible odds.  ...against hordes of archers, crossbowmen, swordsman, and boars...  ...I STAND ALONE!
